title.rendered: ANVIZ M5 PRO OUTDOOR FINGERPRINT & RFID ACCESS CONTROL

content.rendered:
M5 Pro is a compact access control device that is designed to fit most door frames. The metal casing, with IP65 water-proof design, makes it suitable for indoor or outdoor applications. M5 Pro supports 125kHz Optional Mifare cards and fingerprint identification.
It has both Wiegand and TCP/IP, Optional Bluetooth protocol interfaces and can be combined with SC011 (Power supply controller) to be a standalone access control device, or integrated with a professional distributed access controller from a third-party to enable large-scale networks.

Features

  • Fingerprint capacity – 3,000
  • Card Capacity – 3,000
  • Log Capacity – 50,000
  • Network port – TCP/IP, Optional Bluetooth
  • Relay – Relay output
  • Identification Mode – Fingerprint/Card
  • Verification speed – < 0.5s(1:N)
  • Card Read Range – 0.78 to 1.96 in. (10 to 50 mm)
  • Wiegand protocol – Support Wiegand 26
  • Optical Sensor – AFOS Optical Sensor
  • Operating Voltage – 12V DC
